content.query:
USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW tsc_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_overview_Oneyear
AS

SELECT [Date]
,[Report_Date]
,[UnitPrice]
,[Quantity]
,[CostInBillingCurrency]
,[EffectivePrice]
,[ActiveWBS]
,[ai_VMName]
,[AppID]
,[ApplicationName]
,[ChargeType]
,[ConsumedService]
,[MeterSubCategory]
,[PricingModel]
,[CostAllocationCode]
,[CostAllocationType]
,[IsRIUsage]
,[ResourceLocation]
,[ServiceFamily]
,[SubscriptionId]
,[MeterCategory]
,[MeterName]
,[MeterRegion]
,[SubscriptionName]
,[SubscriptionWBS]
,[UnitOfMeasure]
,[ResourceGroup]
,[ResourceId]
,[ResourceName]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/aggregate/parquet/Extended_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_overview_OneYear.parquet/*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
